p: The title compound was prepared according to the general procedure for the synthesis of N-Aryl-benzenesulfonamides previously described using 138 mg of (2-Amino-5-bromo-phenyl)-pyridin-4-yl-methanone and 102 mg of 4-ethyl-benzenesulfonyl chloride. 1H-NMR (400 MHz, CDCl3): Î´ 1.19 (t, 3H, J = 7.6 Hz), 2.62 (q, 2H, J = 7.6 Hz), 7.20 (d, 2H, J = 8.8 Hz, 7.38 (m, 3H), 7.65-7.72 (m, 4H), 8.81 (d, 2H, 6.4 Hz), 10.06 (s, 1H). MS: m/z 446.0 (M+ + 1).
